Text: February savings of Save on items If you would like to view this email as a graphical version please click on the link below cgibinfloymFuHERkdZDIbBgsyBx Dear LINDY February is the best time to save on items youve loved all season long Youll find over handselected items at off original prices including our soft simple sweater ribbed collared pullover and Italian stretch trousers Hurryquantities are limited Click on the link below to start shopping now cgibinfloymFuHERkdZDIbBgszBy If you are unable to click on the links above please copy and paste the links into your browser Click the link below to modify your subscription or unsubscribe unsubscribeaspea

Order now Pay nothing until summerOrder now Pay nothing until Memorial Day Dear LINDY Warm weather is just around the corner Nows a perfect time to stock up on your favorite spring styles Make all your spring purchases by March and your major credit card will not be billed until Memorial Day Best of all theres no minimum purchase necessary Click on the link below for details cgibinfloymFysERkdZDMwBkWBg To redeem this offer be sure to select the deferred billing box on the Billing Information page An order confirmation email will follow Click on the link below for details cgibinfloymFysERkdZDMwBkWBg If you are unable to click on the link above copy and paste the link into your browser All orders must be placed by March to be considered for the deferred billing option This offer cannot be used in combination with any other promotions discounts previous offers or previous orders and is not available for use on debit cards secured cards or the J Jill credit card For your security all orders are preauthorized prior to shipment J Jill reserves the right to refuse deferred billing to anyone Click the link below to modify your subscription or unsubscribe unsubscribeaspea

Exclusive offer for email customersSpecial Offer exclusively for our email customers If you would like to view this email as a graphical version please click on the link below cgibinfloymFWERkdZDRBBkryBp Dear LINDY For a limited time we have an exclusive offer just for you our Italian Suede Jacket at the special price of was Click on the link below for more details or to view this jacket cgibinfloymFWERkdZDRBBkrcBT And through this email only youll save on standard delivery charges To redeem your shipping discount select the standard delivery option on the Billing Information page Hurry quantities are limited and offer is available only through this email Expires March Click on the link below for more details or to view this jacket cgibinfloymFWERkdZDRBBkrcBT Offer expires March Special pricing valid through this email only and is not available in retail stores in the catalog or on the jjillcom web site Discounted shipping rate applies to standard delivery charges only Additional charges will be incurred for quick express and internationalCanadian deliveries Click on the link below to unsubscribe cgibinfloymFWERkdZDRBBguZBJea Click on the link below if you would like to change your email format HTML or text cgibinfloymFWERkdZDRBBguZBJea If you are unable to click on the links above copy and paste the link into your browser
